attributes.action: crack down on and penalise all religious institutions that promote extremism in Britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With documentaries such as Channel 4's 'Undercover Mosque' it is apparent that young British citizens are being indoctrinated to practise Islamic law in Britain.
The majority of British people are open to different religions and opinions which is outstanding for our country - but this sort of extremism goes too far.
Religious institutions in Britain should be randomly selected to be viewed often and extremist ones should be brought to justice.
